thread.title_full: Perfect place to stay when visitng the city so see the Broadway shows. - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AbbieKai
title: Perfect place to stay when visitng the city so see the Broadway shows.
text: This hotel was perfect for us to stay overnight to see a couple of Broadway Shows. The room was very clean. We really enjoyed the wine, cheese, crackers, tea and coffee etc. and the nice breakfast. All was included. The staff was so friendly and helpful. After we check out they offered to hold on to our luggage while we attended the afternoon play. I am looking forward to my return visit to this hotel. Thank you Casablanca Hotel Staff!
